result.arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
result.translation: 98. Ee ku tasbiixso ammaanaha Rabbigaa oo ka mid ahow kuwa u sujuuda24.
result.footnotes:
24. Ibnu Cabbaas a.k.r. waxaa laga soo weriyey inuu yidhi: Waxaan ku garan jirey bogidda salaadda faralka kor ugu qaadista codka Xusidda Alle sida takbiirta.
(W.w. Al-Bukhaari)
